reviews.review:
Un juego muy aburrido y repetitivo.
Jugué el tutorial, después jugué una partida como sobreviviente y fui el segundo en morir, después jugué como asesino y mate a los 4 nadie escapó eso que parecía que dos eran muy buenos y los otros 2 decentes.
Sinceramente se me hace aburrido, como el juego de las escondidas, vaya que solo tiene 3-4 botones, de sobreviviente te escondes y reparas motores.
De asesino rondas por los motores buscando jugadores les das un hAchazo y para el gancho, y es todo el juego, entiendo que hay habilidades especiales el que tenía pone trampas y agarra trampas y las pone donde sea, pero la mecánica principal se ve que es repetitiva.

Sobreviviente: corre, se agacha, un botón de acción para reparar motores, tirar tablas, esconderse en el closet, revivir amigos, bajar amigos del gancho etc.
Y debe reparar motores que son super aburridos y esconderse.

Asesino: siento que es muy poderoso pero bueno no sé mucho del juego quizás la gente diga está balanceado por esto y por esto, y quizás tengan razón pero lo único que hace es.
Una habilidad ya sea poner trampas o la que tenga, dar machetazos, agarrar jugadores del suelo, y llevarlos al gancho, merodear por los motores para buscar jugadores y estropearla todo con el mismo boton
Very shitty game but you should still buy it for no reason!

Игра на любителя

세상에는 정신이 나간 사람들이 많습니다.
운전하다 보면 깜빡이도 없이 자동차 머리부터 쑤셔 넣으면
어떻게든 차선변경이 가능하다고 생각하는 운전자도 있고
어린 애들 속여다가 돈 버는 부끄러운 어른도 있습니다.
그리고 살인을 저지르는 사람들도 있죠.

그 사람들은 과연 살인을 즐기는 걸까요?

이 게임을 해보시면 아실 수 있을 겁니다.
여러분의 마음 속에 있는 또 하나의 자신을 발견해보세요.

살인마가 되어 생존자를 처단하며 빠르게 뛰는 심장과
하나 하나 엔티티 곁으로 보낼 때마다 기뻐하는 자신을 보세요.

어느새 혼잣말로 생존자들을 우롱하며
피를 갈망하고 있을 것입니다.

자아성찰의 게임, 데드 바이 데이라이트에 어서오세요.

ORIGINAL REVIEW
Two things:
1. This is kind of an impulse review... I'm kinda in the moment right now, so I might sound a little harsh.
2. This review is directed entirely towards the community that fosters this game.

I've never thought I'd give a negative review for this game...

but before I do, I want to say that I do enjoy this game. Everything about it is well done and engaging and I recommend people to play it. It's just the longer I play it, the angrier I become with the community this game fosters.

So... I've played this a while now and I can't seem to stop. 806 hours and counting and it only took three consecutive killer matches to really sour my view on DBD's community. For the record, I do use a killer perk called NOED (No one escapes death) on occasion. This perk allows me to one hit survivors once all the generators are completed. It is often looked down upon from the survivor perspective. No matter how well you perform in the match, survivors will criticize and insult you for the use of a single perk.

I've lost sleep over some of the things players have said to me... I applaud any killer mains out there, as they have probably obtained an uncanny ability to not be phased by any insults thrown at them. I'm relatively good at it, too, but three matches in a row with disrespectful survivors makes my depression kick in.

The toxicity doesn't stop there. It even happens when you're on the same team! For survivors who say reaching the highest rank is "easy", that is a purely subjective opinion that cannot be relied on unless you happen to have an easier time reaching it than other survivors. These survivors will criticize you for going down too quickly and too often and for not being able to loop the killer for five minutes straight. I play survivor to escape the toxicity of three other survivors, not be insulted by them.

__________________________________________________________________

EDIT

OK, so... My heart has been battle hardened, so I can now tolerate the baby insults thrown at me by professional survivalists that rub salt in my wound! YAY!

I think I stated I enjoy this game in my original review and that still holds true. I've been forcing myself to play as the killer (the more stressful role) as I only have to wait about 5 seconds to play. Compared to the many cumulative hours I spent waiting as a survivor, something new for a change is nice.
you can't have manslaughter without laughter
MARAVILHOSO. SUBARASHI. SUCULENTO. DELÍCIA QUE NÃO SE COMPARA A QUALQUER EXPERIÊNCIA DE JOGO ONLINE.

The last time I played it, it was just such an incredible game. The only mildly negative thing about it is that the killers get experience faster than you do as a survivor. Which in turn has an upside because you can use that experience gained on the survivor. Win lose win. All in all one of the best games I have ever played. Human nature at its finest. Save yourself. Let the others die if it saves your own skin haha
